languages.text: "Для вас все относительно просто: убивайте всех врагов на пути и не дайте убить себя. Саргону надо захватить живым для допроса, но этим займусь я с моим отрядом. И еще кое-что".
"The task is relatively simple: kill all enemies we encounter and not let them kill us. Sargona must be taken alive for questioning, but I and my team will handle that. There is one other thing."
languages.original_text: "Для вас все относительно просто: убивайте всех врагов на пути и не дайте убить себя. Саргону надо захватить живым для допроса, но этим займусь я с моим отрядом. И еще кое-что".

traits.locale_text: "Your task is relatively simple: kill all enemies you encounter and don't let them kill you. Sargona must be taken alive for questioning, but I and my team will handle that. There is one other thing."

"Your task is relatively simple: kill all enemies you encounter and don't let them kill you. Sargona must be taken alive for questioning, but I and my team will handle that. There is one other thing."

"Your task is relatively simple: kill all enemies you encounter and don't let them kill you. Sargona must be taken alive for questioning, but I and my team will handle that. There is one other thing."
"The task is relatively simple: kill all enemies we encounter and not let them kill us. Sargona must be taken alive for questioning, but I and my team will handle that. There is one other thing."
"The task is relatively simple: kill all enemies we encounter and not let them kill us. Sargona must be taken alive for questioning, but I and my team will handle that. There is one other thing."

languages.text: «La misión es relativamente sencilla: mate a todos los enemigos que encontremos y no deje que nos maten. Necesitamos a Sargona con vida para interrogarle, pero mi equipo y yo nos encargaremos de eso. Una cosa más...».
languages.original_text: "The task is relatively simple: kill all enemies we encounter and not let them kill us. Sargona must be taken alive for questioning, but I and my team will handle that. There is one other thing."

traits.locale_text: «La misión es relativamente sencilla: mate a todos los enemigos que encontremos y no deje que nos maten. Necesitamos a Sargona con vida para interrogarle, pero mi equipo y yo nos encargaremos de eso. Una cosa más...».

languages.text: “任务比较简单，干掉遇到的所有敌人，别被他们干掉。萨戈纳不能杀，必须抓活的来审。不过，这件事情交给我和我的人就行了。除此之外，还有一件事情。”
languages.original_text: "The task is relatively simple: kill all enemies we encounter and not let them kill us. Sargona must be taken alive for questioning, but I and my team will handle that. There is one other thing."

traits.locale_text: “任务比较简单，干掉遇到的所有敌人，别被他们干掉。萨戈纳不能杀，必须抓活的来审。不过，这件事情交给我和我的人就行了。除此之外，还有一件事情。”

languages.text: « La mission est relativement simple : tuez tous les ennemis que nous croiserons et empêchez-les de nous tuer. Sargona doit être pris vivant pour qu'on puisse l'interroger, mais ça, c'est du ressort de mon équipe et moi-même. Dernière chose... »
languages.original_text: "The task is relatively simple: kill all enemies we encounter and not let them kill us. Sargona must be taken alive for questioning, but I and my team will handle that. There is one other thing."

traits.locale_text: « La mission est relativement simple : tuez tous les ennemis que nous croiserons et empêchez-les de nous tuer. Sargona doit être pris vivant pour qu'on puisse l'interroger, mais ça, c'est du ressort de mon équipe et moi-même. Dernière chose... »

languages.text: 「タスクは比較的簡単です。遭遇した敵を殺し、彼らに殺されないようにすること。サルゴナは尋問のために生け捕りにしなければなりませんが、それについては私と私のチームが対応します。あともう一つあります」
languages.original_text: "The task is relatively simple: kill all enemies we encounter and not let them kill us. Sargona must be taken alive for questioning, but I and my team will handle that. There is one other thing."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたのタスクは比較的簡単です。遭遇した敵を殺し、彼らに殺されないようにすること。サルゴナは尋問のために生け捕りにしなければなりませんが、それについては私と私のチームが対応します。あともう一つあります」

languages.text: "Görev çok basit. Karşılaştığımız tüm düşmanları öldüreceğiz, bu süreçte ölmeyeceğiz. Sargona, sorgulanmak üzere canlı ele geçirilmeli ama bunu ben ve ekibim halledeceğiz. Bir şey daha var."
languages.original_text: "The task is relatively simple: kill all enemies we encounter and not let them kill us. Sargona must be taken alive for questioning, but I and my team will handle that. There is one other thing."

traits.locale_text: "Görev çok basit. Karşılaştığımız tüm düşmanları öldüreceğiz, bu süreçte ölmeyeceğiz. Sargona, sorgulanmak üzere canlı ele geçirilmeli ama bunu ben ve ekibim halledeceğiz. Bir şey daha var."

languages.text: "Die Aufgabe ist relativ simpel: Tötet alle Gegner, auf die wir treffen, und lasst Euch nicht von ihnen töten. Wir brauchen Sargona lebend, um ihn zu verhören, aber darum kümmert sich mein Team. Da wäre aber noch eine Sache."
languages.original_text: "The task is relatively simple: kill all enemies we encounter and not let them kill us. Sargona must be taken alive for questioning, but I and my team will handle that. There is one other thing."
